website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality soft hot tub cover that’s durable enough to withstand the elements, provides full coverage for maximum protection, and won’t break the bank.
pros: Made of durable 600D polyester canvas with waterproof backing
Hem is elasticized and features toggles to adjust the fit
Sturdy enough to keep rain and snow out of the hot tub in addition to dirt, debris, and bird droppings
cons: Can blow off in strong winds
Some users find the drawstrings and toggles to be somewhat flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover to help with leaking cover
customer_reviews.text: Our hot tub cover leaks in the rain, so it throws off the chemicals. Instead of buying another cover, we got this and it works great. You don't have to take it completely off when you're gonna use the tub, it stays with the cover and folds back with it
customer_reviews.author: Mike Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Hi quality, fits big.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, hi quality. My tub is 85x85 and this fits big.
customer_reviews.author: monkeldad

customer_reviews.title: Ties don't work...
customer_reviews.text: Look, as heavy as this is, as nicely as it seems to fit, I live in a windy area, and NONE of the cinching ties work. I tried several old tricks and techniques, and nothing. If you can afford it not to be tight, you're willing to risk it, this is fine for you. If not, you might want to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Did last 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cover in March 2019, by June 2019 I noticed pen size holes in the cover which I'm assuming is due to sun exposure. These holes are small but large enough to allow water to seep through onto my main/insulated hot tub cover. This means I have sitting water between this cover and my hot tub insulated cover. Not good at all. Hopefully the warranty will cover this or I'm s.o.l. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MnM

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 years 8 months in full NM sun.
customer_reviews.text: I bought cover caps for years and they only lasted 6 months. They were cheaper $30 covers. This one (ULTCover 600D) lasted 2yr 8mo. Full New Mexico sun at 6000ft altitude. It also experienced a little bit of snow/ice in that time. With the UV rays it finally got brittle and cracked. It did fade fairly quickly after purchase but still had a decent lighter tan color. I'm happy to have found a cover that lasted this long at an okay price. It maintained it's waterproof capability until the end. Protected my $600-$700 cover which I'd be replacing now if not for this cover over a cover! The new version looks a little different but I'm giving it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Harley

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable solution
customer_reviews.text: The vinyl that covers my 5" thick hot tub cover was cracking and getting a few tears in it so I was looking for a new one - they are so expensive - and with various big events (wedding, grandchild, college students) it was not in the budget without debt so I was looking for a short term solution to the ugly of the cracking cover and the fact that once the vinyl fails your styrofoam will take on water and start to crack. This was just the ticket. We put it over the top of the existing cover and it is keeping the water out and making the hot tub look nice. Great, economical solution.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Decent cover, good seller
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover. The original version that I bought in 2018 only had bungies to keep it on and it frequently blew off. I do live in WY so for most of the country that may not be that big of a deal. The cover only lasted about 18 months and started to fall apart from sun damage. The seller immediately sent out a new cover after I contacted them last month. The new cover is a better design with buckles and bungies. It has stayed on during our spring storms with minimal movement. I don't know how the longevity will be but the seller did stand behind their warranty.
customer_reviews.author: WY Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Completely Faded
customer_reviews.text: After 3 weeks of spring time sun the color is completely faded out. I now have a white piece of canvas covering my hot tub. Looks cheap and detracts from the whole patio. Seller offered a $10 refund and admitted to the fading problem. So, if you want a cheap looking piece of colorless fabric, this is the place to go. Wonder how well it will hold up otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Kowalski

customer_reviews.title: Ventilation
customer_reviews.text: This cover is very good. The problem I found was that it caused the head rest in the hottub to get Moldy... after a few days of cleaning them (mold killer) and leave them exposed to the sun, it's all is clean. I don't want to use the cover again... eventhough it is of excellent quality. I didn't work for me because of Ventilation.
customer_reviews.author: EMG

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for any hot tub!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a replacement cover for my 4 person hot tub. It’s very light, canvas like material that’s extremely easy to put on / take off and holds the hot tub heat in great! The adjustable corners allow for more of a “one size fits all” type of purchase. Would definitely recommend this cover to anyone who needs a light weight, easy to take off / put on Replacement hot tub cover. Wish I would have bought this cover years ago instead of the much more expensive original big, thick brown leather style hot tub cover that is not durable and very labor intensive to take in & off.
customer_reviews.author: OR Double dad

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value!
customer_reviews.text: Our hot tub cover needs to be replaced. So we purchased this to get us through the summer before the harsh NJ winter. It has been clean, protective and hasn’t moved even during a recent tropical storm. It’s thick and great quality. It faded a bit from the sun but who cares - it’s protecting the Hottub and that’s all that matters. Great purchase and very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: LLA

customer_reviews.title: Very happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fabulous product that fits very well on our 7.5 foot square hot tub. I like it being a little larger because it fits well over our spa cover lifter. Length on sides is perfect and helps protect sides ofbtub from direct sunlight. If this cover lasts 2-4 years in direct sunlight I have no issue buying another. I gave 5 star for durability but I've only had the cover in use for about 6 weeks. Time will tell. However, if it last 2-3 years I'm delighted and the 5 star for durability is fair in my opinion. In short, great product and good value for price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: Our buckles had broken on our hot tub cover so we had to tie it down which was a pain when we wanted to use it! I bought this as an alternative to a new cover. Our wind is pretty crazy at times and this has held up great! We've had it for about a month now and have had some bad wind. It stays down and keeps the cover closed! It has a lot of different ways to adjust it do make it fit correctly!
customer_reviews.author: TBastian

customer_reviews.title: Work Great
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a tarp to cover the tub. This goes on so much easier and seems to work great. Easy to put on and take off. I used additional tarp ties from cover strap to deck boards to make sure it wouldn't come off as I have it at 2nd home and I'm gone for several weeks at a time. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: J. Coats

customer_reviews.title: good cover but....
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this cover when I bought it. it fit well, seemed constructed well and fit my brand new high buck cover to a t. . But we live in an area that gets snow & cold..... Anyway, got this cover last april. Here it is the next April and sorry to say the cover has ripped. Very disappointing since this cover is not cheap. I haven't contacted the seller, so we'll see if someone responds to try and make it right....we'll let you know
customer_reviews.author: Mic L

customer_reviews.title: Failed less than a year Arizona
customer_reviews.text: Failed less than a year. Try to find how to get your 3 year warranty - i spent over an hour. - can't find email, phone number, anything. This is actually my second one. Bought two of them. Doesn't last in Scottsdale Az - not even as hot as Phoenix.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Super Nice Hot Tub Cover
customer_reviews.text: We just received this hot tub cover, so I cannot yet rate whether it's water resistant. I'm rating its durability high because it really does seem durable! It was easy to place on and use. I love its look, but more than that, I love how it will stay in place with the high winds in our area. Our last cover constantly came up in the winds and let dirt and rain under it. The elastic never did its job and the entire thing wore quickly. This one comes down far, straps tightly around the sides, and looks and feels so much better! I'm very happy with it overall!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saves the Hot tub cover lid!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and off and stays put even in windy weather with the sinch ties on each corner This cover is doing a great job at protecting our hot tub lid from all the sun damage, nicks that would comes from squirrels making their way across it and from small branches hitting it when it would rain hard . The cover is very sun damaged already though and it has developed a few black mold spots when we had several weeks of rain and we hadn’t taken the cover off. Over all for the cost , it’s saving the much more expensive cover and will be worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: 9kids

customer_reviews.title: We love this product!
customer_reviews.text: We've owned a Hot Tub for nearly 30 years and recently purchased ANOTHER new Hot Tub Cover. I 've always been on the look out for an outer cover to protect our new purchase. We came across this item on Amazon and decided to take a chance. Wow - very rugged, durable material and (I think) an award winning design. You can open the Hot Tub Cover with this installed. It fits right over the top! Doesn't get any better!
customer_reviews.author: C W Woods

customer_reviews.title: Hot tub cover complete color fade-out
customer_reviews.text: Although the cover is easy to use, it is obvious by the color fade from tan to pink that it is not very durable in the hot sun. It has only been a less than a few months and the cover is already deteorating in color and texture. I believed that I was purchasing a higher quality cover but it is pre-maturely fading and is not holding up to the elements. I would not recommend this cover for this price. If these covers to not hold up, it would be cheaper and just as functional to buy a plastic tarp.
customer_reviews.author: Spunkydoodle

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: This cover seems much better than expected. There is a couple things I will not read until I take it off as far as being waterproof I won’t know that until then. But from everything I see I could not have picked a better cover. It seems to be very well designed very secure we ordered a little bit Bigger because we have an odd sized hot tub but it didn’t matter because the straps you can tighten and it’s just a great product. I will update in the spring when I take it off.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene E Bradford

customer_reviews.title: looks real nice over old worn cover
customer_reviews.text: product i ordered is the 95x95" - fit my tub NO prob - would've been close going with smaller size (~84" tub size) but after putting this on i believe i easily could have fit the smaller one on. Lot of extra cover. makes tub a lot more pleasing to look at would buy again - might even try the smaller size (but prob not cuz i hate having to return stuff) ** 5 months later *** cover color is totally bleached from the sun :-/ otherwise, have had some monster winds this season and cover stayed on no problem
customer_reviews.author: jt

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Last
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this cover to try to prolong the life of my regular hot tub cover. I guess it did that because I still have my regular, heavy, hot tub lid. This cover lasted a year and a half. I just folded it up to put in the trash. The material ripped with the slightest handling. I always try to repurpose items but this item is in complete disintegration. I did remove the elastic that was used to hold the cover on. It was in remarkably good shape. I don't know what I will use it for but I didn't want to just throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: wendy wharton

customer_reviews.title: Holding up well
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this about a year now and it still looks nice, is fairly easy to install and remove, and it’s holding up pretty well. I would suggest using a beach ball to keep the middle up so rain doesn’t weigh it down in the middle. Even when rain built up and stretched it a bit, it still fits good and mostly returned to its shape within a few sunny days.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: High quality. Perfect fit w/ lifter bar. A+
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this cover is awesome. It fit perfectly over my hot tub even with the lifter bar. The clips and cord that are installed on it worked out great. It's super windy here today and no problem. I'd been buying crappy tarps, but wanted something nicer. Nice price and the quality is excellent. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: W.K

customer_reviews.title: Lasts less than a year if kept on an outside hot tub.
customer_reviews.text: This cover lasted less than a year. It has faded, frayed, come apart at the seams and basically disintegrated in the 10 months I have had it. I live in Florida so the climate is hot and rainy but other than being unfolded and placed on the hot tub it has never even been touched. It should have lasted much longer. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: My jacuzzi deck lid, needs to be replaced and they are expensive $500 and up!. I bought this until I can afford to replace it and it really does take a beating when it comes to rain and wind but protects my hot tub! We get wind gust to 50mph and heavy rain and so far this cover has protested the hot tub a heck of a lot better then the deck lid!
customer_reviews.author: vspmax

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate covers
customer_reviews.text: I have requested a replacement from this company since this is what it looks like after only 1 year. Hopefully they will replace this since company states item comes with 3 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: tina peck

customer_reviews.title: Buying my second one
customer_reviews.text: This one lasted only a year, but given that it was in the full Arizona sun all day every day, never getting shade and lived through several monsoons, I'm actually good with that. When my dog jumped on top of it, it finally ripped. I'm happy to buy another, I looked into a hard top but since this hot tub will be replaced in the next year or two, I decided to save the money.
customer_reviews.author: MartifromNY

customer_reviews.title: Did the job!
customer_reviews.text: Cover does not fit as neatly in picture. We had a previous one for 2 years and it took quite a beating before we had to replace. Hope this one lasts as long. As they age they are not as pliable and grow stiff. Also pin holes developed on the first one after two years of use. We are in the northeast and have large seasonal temperature ranges, but the cover did the job of protecting the spa cover.
customer_reviews.author: Owls aerie

customer_reviews.title: Better in person than in the photos
customer_reviews.text: We have an 84x84 square tub from Caldera Spas. We ordered the 95x85. It has an extra 4-5 inches of circumference. We have a hot tub lift kit on it so we wanted the extra room for easy removal and installation. It has a draw string to pull it tighter and each corner has 2 buckle clips allowing you to chose how tight you want to make it fit around the tub. It is good quality canvas, it exceeded my expectations. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Trenerry

customer_reviews.title: Faded badly within a month
customer_reviews.text: I have had this cover for exactly one month and it has faded to almost white. The photo shows it agains the underside of the cover on the side so you can see the original color. Overall, I like the cover, but the fact that it has faded so terribly is frustrating. I emailed the company and they said fading is normal So beware...
customer_reviews.author: Gun guy

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: We used this cover over our older insulated cover that held water. It worked great because of course it rained the night we received it. The next day was able to remove both covers easily with no water in old insulated cover. We were so impressed we ordered the grill cover from the same company.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts? Not enough straps. And now leaking seam!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the quality of the fabric seems decent but the product appears to be missing some straps. It has more clips than straps to attach to the clips. Because of this, it can’t be secured properly. Also, after two weeks, one of the seams across the top of the cover is clearly leaking moisture through. Amazon does not provide any way to directly contact the seller in this case, as they do with some other items, but maybe the seller will see this and take care of it?
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and concept
customer_reviews.text: We didn’t want to spend money on another hot tub cover.. ours works but looks horrible. Found this cover to go over our existing. I am very happy with the quality of the material. Fits very well. Will be shopping for other outdoor furniture covers made by the same company.
customer_reviews.author: Madonna Burton

customer_reviews.title: Fits hot tub perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Our hot tub lid got soaked thru and thru & is ruined but this cover fits perfectly over the old one and the waterproofing works !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will add years to the life of our lid
customer_reviews.text: Our hot tub lid is only 2 years old and was getting scorched by the sun. This cover is built well and stays on when we open the lid. It appears that it is waterproof as well with taped seams.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Brewer

customer_reviews.title: No hassle GUARATEE!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover last year and it somehow developed a rip. I contacted Superella and was pleasantly surprised to find they actually stand behind their product! Today, I received a replacement cover for my hot tub. This is an outstanding company! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Nvr Relct Eny1

customer_reviews.title: Stand by their product
customer_reviews.text: I brought this cover in 2018 and the material started to fail recently. I contacted ULTCOVER and provided them my concerns. ULTCOVER provided me with a new cover within 7 days. Excellent customer service on a very good product. Thank you ULTCOVER
customer_reviews.author: Kristy T.

customer_reviews.title: Tears and faded fast
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed when i got it. Faded really fast it is out in the sun all day and that's ok. But broomed the snow off of it to see that it has got tears in it and it is only 8 months old.. guess i have to cover the cover?
customer_reviews.author: Couture B.

customer_reviews.title: Hot tub cover.
customer_reviews.text: I was waiting before writing this review, I have purchased numerous so called waterproof covers that have all failed with the exception of this one. Good looks, heavy weight material and so far waterproof, great fitting and sides help keep heat in. My hi ot tub is outdoors and fully exppsed to the elements. Highly recommend , I'll be buying another for back up.
customer_reviews.author: RJP

customer_reviews.title: Puddles water on top, no way to prevent.
customer_reviews.text: Rain puddles on top and no way to stop it. I've tightened it down quite a bit and still not keeping the water off. When you try to take the cover off to drain the water it all falls inside the hot tub. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: DDR

customer_reviews.title: Color fades fast, Not Breathable
customer_reviews.text: This is an updated review: I've had the cover for a year now. The color faded faster than a liberal at a congressional hearing. It was 2 to 3 months in the brutal michigan sun (sarcasm) and the color was fading. Otherwise it's good. Hasn't leaked. Moisture/condensation can collect on the underside which means the cover does not breath well. I've used the cover to protect and waterproof an empty hot tub for 2 years now. A small amount of water, maybe from condensation does make its way into the hot tub. I'll be purchasing the same cover as the old one ripped in several places, my fault, from dragging nails across the top.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy H. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Not fade resistant
customer_reviews.text: Yes the price is right and it fits. However in just 4 Winter months it faded from the Jersey sun. The square in the photo is from a paver that was placed on top in case of strong winds.
customer_reviews.author: ANDY

customer_reviews.title: Not good for direct sunlight
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice cover. It truly is wate proof and durable. My spa is on an open deck. The cover faded within 2 months, so I threw it away. I decided to make my own slipcover for the top using marine grade vinyl. It looks more fitted and nicer to me.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Works great! We got this because our cover was coming apart at the seam. This helped save energy. I was a little worried we'd have to remove it all the way before using hot tub, but nope, it stays on while we lift cover over
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: Does what I need it to do
customer_reviews.text: It's not bad. Something this size for the price you get what you pay for. Claims water resistance but it's really not it will soak through every time it rains but I only have it to keep my new hot tub cover protected from the elements. Does it's job but the exact specs of this saying water resistance and UV protection is not really accurate
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality! Order wrong size. Placement into days. I did not want to spend five hundred dollars for a new hot tub cover so I used over the old cover. Great idea! Worked perfectly. Great customer service! My old top had a lift.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Sits on top covering
customer_reviews.text: I haven't owned it very long, so my review isn't worth much, but it looks as promised, fits easily on my 84x84" Marquis hot tub, and has been easy to put on, take off, and tighten. I purchased this to prolong the life of the main cover and also to try to conserve some heat/electricity in the bitter New England cold.
customer_reviews.author: Bitey (the big one)

customer_reviews.title: It is waterproof but hard to keep down in wind ...
customer_reviews.text: It is waterproof but hard to keep down in wind. I found if i pull the cord down under the corner of the hot tub, it will stay on in wind. Sun faded really fast, we arent even into Summer yet and its already very light in color, hope it holds up for a few years at least!
customer_reviews.author: P. MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: It’s super strong...here’s how I know...
customer_reviews.text: So I just wanted an easy cover to throw on the hot tub instead of the heavy regular cover when I didn’t have anyone to help lift it on. It’s really fitted, good quality and I discovered unintentionally that 2-50lb kids can even climb on it without damage (not that they’ll do that again!) It’s a winner!
customer_reviews.author: TN Mom of Twins

customer_reviews.title: this cover saves your expensive spa cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover is waterproof and saves the look of your expensive spa cover. I bought this to keep me from replacing my thick spa cover for another year. It is waterproof but it sun damages easily and quickly here in Texas. My plan is to use this until it breaks and then get another one. I figure that it will prolong the life of the $400 cover by twice.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S. Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Very high-quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very high-quality! Can’t say enough good things about this product. It fits great, looks great, and opens and closes without having to remove it from the cover. For years I had an indoor outdoor carpet over the cover to protect it and had to remove that each time we use the tub. Once you determine the size you need order it without concern.
customer_reviews.author: Jack B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Our hot tub cover became water logged and extremely heavy. Didn’t feel like spending $500 right now. This was just what we were looking for. Fits perfect, looks nice & sturdy and does not look like it will blow off easily.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Product lasted 1.5 years, but received  warranty replacement
customer_reviews.text: The cover was fine for the first year, but now it is falling apart, tearing, etc. It is supposed to have a three year warranty. Customer service is offering to send me a new cover, will update when I receive it. 1/12/20 Update: Replacement cover received. Updated review from 3 stars to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Kid

customer_reviews.title: Well made and functional!
customer_reviews.text: I use this cover as a cover for my new, very expensive insulated spa cover. It protects it from the sun, and it tightens down so it doesn’t blow away. It moves easily with the “real” cover as well. We have many cats, and this cover is thick and protective. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: H. Tim Strebor

customer_reviews.title: First day review, Happy So Far.....😎
customer_reviews.text: My cover was ordered on a Sunday and delivered on Tuesday (1 day early). Cover looks good and material appears to be good quality. I just bought a new spa and it will be in direct 100 degree CA sun 8 hours a day so this cover was insurance to keep the spa cover looking like new. I took advise from another review to order the next size up so it fits over the mechanical spa cover mechanism and that worked out great. Will report back in a month or so after I see if I get the material color fade other reviews reported.
customer_reviews.author: MojoRison

customer_reviews.title: Cover is durable, but color fade is really bad (only less than 2 months old)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on June 15 and didn't even use it until July 12 but it is August 24 and as you can see from the picture, the cover's color has already faded and it looks years old instead of 2 months. old.
customer_reviews.author: AsianGeekGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit  7 x 7 Hot Tub
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the quality and fit of this product. Fabric is nice and sturdy and fits the 7 x 7 hot tub perfectly. I would highly recommend it for protection from high winds or direct sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: Scorpio Texas

customer_reviews.title: IT IS WATERPROOF!  Works well, nice and tight
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cover we've had so far in 5 years and we had 3 others. This fits tight to the tub cover, we can leave it on when we use the tub and it is waterproof and wind proof. Very happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, nice fit
customer_reviews.text: All we can say is that it looks and fits great. Nice quality. We can't really comment on the waterproofing since it hasn't rained here in almost 7 months. As far as durability? Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: PP

customer_reviews.title: Protect your costly H T cover.
customer_reviews.text: If you don't want to shell out $300+ every few years to replace your hot tub cover, this is a fine alternative product. It seems to be very well constructed, designed to protect your investment. The durability is yet to be tested, but it looks like it should hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Aman

customer_reviews.title: Cover
customer_reviews.text: I use mine for my hot tub. Where I live there is a lot of dust and dirt in the air. I live near a farming community. The cover keeps my hot tube lid well covered and keeps the dirt from getting into the material of the lid. So glad I bought mine.
customer_reviews.author: Admdutch

customer_reviews.title: How Do You make a claim on your warranty
customer_reviews.text: After about 20 months, my Ultcover shredded. When I tried to submit a claim for my 3-year warranty, the advertised email address for the manufacturer is invalid. When googling Ultcover, the only google listings are for Amazon.com. I contacted Amazon and they refunded me my money; however, I think it is pretty important to be able to contact the manufacturer for warranty claims?? Why is the manufacturer hiding?? Amazon needs to get legitimate contact information for product warranty claims.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Smith

customer_reviews.title: How it will hold up to the Arizona summer sun
customer_reviews.text: The cover looks and feels great and sturdy. It felt perfectly. The real test will occur over the summer months here in Arizona to determine how it holds up under the intense summer sun we enjoy here.
customer_reviews.author: Larry M Newman

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Sundance Optima well and seems to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Fits my Sundance Optima very well and seems to be of good quality. We’ll see how it holds up to the sun the rest of summer and into the Michigan winter.
customer_reviews.author: GoBlue

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for the cover
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover for our cover as the heavy one is black and soaks up the heat of the sun , so I figured this would protect that, it has surpassed my expectations completely! It fits very snug , the straps see to it that it stays put even with the strongest of winds. If your on the fence about this cover don’t hesitate get it , you won’t re-gret !
customer_reviews.author: james runkle

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: cover fits like a glove, material and sewing seems to be of good quality, we will see how it holds up to the colorado sun. Update I have had this cover less than a month and have 1 strap tear off due to wind and the color is fading quick.
customer_reviews.author: Tracker chris

customer_reviews.title: Hot tub
customer_reviews.text: It's been on the hot tub since November. It is holding up extremely well in the wind and rain. I'm sure it's going to be fine with the snow. I have no doubts about it. I love the durability.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Durable good quality
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our old hardcover with this cover and it has worked perfectly for us. Our spa stays on all the time, and since I put this cover on the water level remains full not evaporate the cover is very durable and easy to slip on and off I just pulled one side off and fold it over very easy. When it comes time I will definitely buy this cover again.
customer_reviews.author: Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Lackluster stitching :(
customer_reviews.text: The stitching along the tightening buckles needs to be stronger. It’s very easy to rip while tightening the corners! Or come up with a better design so it doesn’t blow off with strong winds....
customer_reviews.author: Cocoa

customer_reviews.title: Far superior than anything from other vendors like the coverstore
customer_reviews.text: I have a hot springs flair. I originally bought a coverstore cover but it failed at exactly 2 years. I reordered another one and they dropped the quality so much it failed in 4 months a totally inferior product. I bought this one since the coverstore wanted me to jump though hoops before they would honor their warranty. This one is superior in every way, material, durability, fit, etc. wish I had bought this quality 2 years ago. Also, stay away from coverstore JUNK!!
customer_reviews.author: David Perry

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, substantial, effective
customer_reviews.text: This cover is very well constructed and we were impressed with the quality of the material . It was delivered within just a few days. This cover is a great value for the price. We don't think you would regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Niki Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Best bag for buck
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bang for your buck. I ordered a size a little bigger than my hot tub and I was still able to securely fit it with the securing methods they have included on the cover ( clips and elastic) I would buy it again in a heartbeat. I am so happy they have a budget conscious option for hot tub covers .
customer_reviews.author: Chante Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lightweight durable material!
customer_reviews.text: I recently replaced a water soaked Cover and bought a thin bubble pad with this on top For my mothers indoor Hot tub. It works perfect and holds the heat in -plus easy for her to peal back.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: highest quality cover we ever bought and it cost less than the cheaper made ones we bought from the hot tub store!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent !
customer_reviews.text: Discover fits perfectly and because it have all those straps around it able to wrap around the hot tub really nice keeping it hot consistently
customer_reviews.author: eldar c.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: This cover fits like a glove! The tie downs are well thought out- stringties and sturdy clips. I conditioned my current (EXPENSIVE) cover, I didn't want it to deteriorate so quickly. This cover will hopefully do the trick-weird - a cover for a cover. I like the weight and rubberized interior. Tonight I added chemicals and even with my cover lifter it stayed in place and made this task easy.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Sags in the rain.
customer_reviews.text: This would be great if it was just windy or dusty, but it sags when it rains, even a little amount. So if it is under a covered patio, it would be fine, but if it is exposed to water, I wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mari

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable!! Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This cover is lightweight and can be put on by 1 person. I love the adjustable straps and drawstring makes it fit really snug!
customer_reviews.author: teresa lynn nolan

customer_reviews.title: Initial quality, and value outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: Really can’t give a better rating on durability yet, it’s been on the spa for only a few weeks, a better evaluation of this cover will be this fall after it has been subjected to our North Carolina summer.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Wetley

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It's working great! My insulated cover is old, damaged from hail and tearing at the seams. I didn't want youI replace it yet, just before winter. This works great to keep the water off my insulated cover so it doesn't get water logged. I will continue to use it when i get a new insulated cover ro help it last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K.

customer_reviews.title: The clips on the four corners that tighten to hold the cover in place are terribly inferior. None of the four clips will hold ...
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the hot tub cover I ordered. Just one complaint. The clips on the four corners that tighten to hold the cover in place are terribly inferior. None of the four clips will hold the nylon draw cord tightly - thus the wind will blow the cover off. Guess I will have to find some stronger ones and replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Customer1

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover for our cover
customer_reviews.text: I searched all over for a cover to go over our new hot tub cover. A cover for the cover. Lol. We wanted to protect our investment. This cover is nice, the straps adjust to tighten. Our hot tub is out in the open, so it can get windy. The cover has stayed on great. Most of the time it even stays on when we take the main cover off (we have a lift bar). I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Its actually waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: I do not use this for a hot tub, but my outdoor sectional patio furniture. Ive been thru 2 that said they were waterproof, but not. This one, I leave my book, blanket, pillows etc., on the couch and just throw on the cover. its not one of those stiff ones, so it easily flows on, and folds up quite small to store in bench.
customer_reviews.author: Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Covers entire surface.
customer_reviews.text: The cover does completely encase the original spa cover and is waterproof. The product should be purchased with amble room around the entire spa. This one does on our spa and that is a feature to be stressed. Access is straight forward. Very satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cottrell

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Faded after one week. If it rains, cover will sag leaving a bowl of water on hot tub. Tore after a month.. Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Perovich

customer_reviews.title: Testing for complete waterproofing
customer_reviews.text: This is a cover for my outdoor spa I love the ease of on/off application Not sure if it should have some condensation, assuming from the hot temperatures in the summer. I am concerned about the winter season and accumulation of snow. Will know more about the waterproofing after going through the first winter season.
customer_reviews.author: B. S. Chan

customer_reviews.title: Bought for winter protection...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this cover to help protect the hot tub and it's hard cover in the winter, and also to give it another layer of insulation. The cover seems to fit pretty well on my 84"x84" hot tub. I like the clips and how they can be tightened to keep the cover from blowing off. Time will tell how long it will last, but the material is thick and feels durable.
customer_reviews.author: Dad bod

customer_reviews.title: Spasaver
customer_reviews.text: I do not have a vinyl foam cover; I use this cover alone and it works! I live in CA, bought the cover this January and surprisingly the cover keeps the heat in. I have a 6 person spa, with the cover on, it only takes 1.5 to 2 hours for the water to heat- not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine cruz

customer_reviews.title: Fades
customer_reviews.text: Faded very quickly I’m sure it’ll start letting water in soon because it’s getting so worn so quickly. Only had it a month. Other than that it’s been fine, I wanted to love it and expected it to last longer
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Norris

customer_reviews.title: Wish had bought sooner
customer_reviews.text: We have dog that likes to lay on top of hot tub cover. We bought this to cover our hot tub cover. It makes it last
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: 95x95 model Fits Hot Springs Grandee perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Any comment on durability yet but 95x95 does fit Hot Springs Grandee perfectly, together with the easy lift system. See picture. Hot tub is 100x91 plus easy lift along the longer side adds about 8 inches
customer_reviews.author: Kevin G

customer_reviews.title: Just recently purchased the cover
customer_reviews.text: I have just recently purchased the cover. From what I've seen so far the cover looks to be made from quality material , has good tie down straps and the fit was very good. I will find out in spring how waterproof it is once I remove it and see how much water is in the hot tub. So far very pleased with the quality ,fit and the hold down straps.
customer_reviews.author: Darrellynn

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Gary impressed with this item when it rains it actually holds the water I'm going through and looks amazing
customer_reviews.author: Royce

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like it but it was not sq, was oval, used it anyway was made well
customer_reviews.author: Jane Diesing

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy especially with snow
customer_reviews.text: Got this for ripped cover. Too heavy to move each time to open hot tub.
customer_reviews.author: John from Vermont

customer_reviews.title: This is a great idea that works well!
customer_reviews.text: Our Jacuzzi is outside so this thing was awesome over the winter. It seems like it kept the heat in a little better and we could actually take the snow off the top of it without damaging the top
customer_reviews.author: Team blackman

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cover for my hot tub cover. I purchased a new cover and then bought this to protect my new cover. So far this has kept the snow and sun from degrading my hot tub cover, hopefully extending the life of the main cover.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Good added protection
customer_reviews.text: Good for keeping leather out of the sun and protected from harsh weather. Not convenient for frequently used hot tubs but a good protective cover.
customer_reviews.author: elora

product_meta.title: ULTCOVER Waterproof 600D Polyester Square Hot Tub Cover Outdoor SPA Covers 95 x 95 inch
feature_bullets: Guaranteed to fit hot tub size up to 95”(L)x 95”(W), Actual cover size is 97”(L)x97”(W)x20”(H). NOTE: This cover can not be used by itself without an insulated hard cover under it.
Made of top quality 600D polyester canvas complex with waterproof backing. Tough enough to keep rain, hail, snow, dust, leaves and bird droppings away.
ULTCOVER provides 3 years warranty and guarantees to be 100% waterproof with seams taped, it’s a “WATERPROOF & BREATHABLE” cover.
Well-made structured air vents at two sides stay open to prevent wind lofting. Heavy duty elastic cords allows adjustment for a tight and easier fit, especially during high winds and severe weather.
100% coverage design avoids the furniture exposure in the sun makes your hot tub always look like new.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars949 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
